title: Meters - resistor and 2 meters between pts X and Y

content.question: The circuit elements shown in the diagram is part of a larger circuit containing a battery and other resistors. A potential difference of <math alttext="2.0 volts" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>V</mtext></math> is measured with the voltmeter, and a current of <math alttext="0.20 amp" overflow="scroll"><mn>0.20</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>A</mtext></math> is measured with the ammeter. Which of the following changes would result in a current of zero between points <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>?

choices.label: Replacing the existing ammeter with a voltmeter
Replacing the existing voltmeter with an ammeter
Switching the locations of the existing voltmeter and ammeter
Adding a second ammeter between Point <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mtext>X</mtext></math> and the resistor

content.answer: Replacing the existing ammeter with a voltmeter
